• Money — America's ever-increasing material affluence came late into this century. It goes hollow, like most technologies do.
• Hectic pace of modern life — classical culture developed more slowly, even when things were changing most dramatically, and it was sustainable over much longer

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to have an entirely mixed reputation as it has has some good fight scenes, bad acting, low budget and very poor CGI work. It is a basic straight to DVD release with no special features but you can get quite a few laughs if you see past its faults.
